snippet.title: Asahina Mikuru [朝比奈ミクルの横スクロールアクション] Game Sample - PC/Doujin
snippet.description:
Original Air Date: December 03rd, 2009 (Updated January 15th, 2024)

Asahina Mikuru, or its full name: Asahina Mikuru No Yoko Scroll Action [朝比奈ミクルの横スクロールアクション], is a basic action/platformer game made towards the end of 2006. It stars Asahina from "Haruhi Suzumiya" fandom as well as other characters from the series. I won't go into detail about Haruhi Suzumiya, though you've most likely heard of it if you're into Japanese visual novels and anime. You can find related information at the links below:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haruhi_Suzumiya

The game is honestly somewhat mediocre, but the source material is HUGELY POPULAR and has a wealth of content, ranging from numerous fan works, to manga, to anime, to spinoffs, to movies, and much more. Diving into the series as a whole cannot be done within a 5000 character limit.

NOTE: Uploading videos in a different order, as some are being redone.

- ADDITION -

Visit GS At: http://www.gamingsanctuary.com
